resources.string:
"While Restrict background data is enabled, you may not be able to:
- Download content via the Internet or Play Store. - View multimedia content via applications such as Internet, Music, Video, and YouTube. - Send or receive multimedia messages via messaging and instant messaging applications.
The restrictions above do not apply while using Wi-Fi networks."

"Smart network helps to conserve battery life.
It disables mobile data and Wi-Fi when the screen is turned off, so that the device consumes less battery.
However, you may receive cumulative push data when you turn on the screen."
%s is requesting permission to access your SIM card. Allowing this request will disable calling and messaging functions, and disable Mobile data on your device. Allow?

"When you enable data roaming, you may result in additional roaming charges.
This setting affects all users on this device."
Connected to device audio.

"This function allows you to share files between NFC-capable devices by holding them close together. S Beam will enable Wi-Fi Direct on both devices and instantly connect them. For example, you can share images or video files from Gallery, notes, documents, and more.
Simply bring the devices together, back to back, then tap your screen. The application that is currently being used will determine what gets beamed."
Passpoint only works when Wi-Fi is enabled. Enable Wi-Fi.
Disabling Wi-Fi…

To improve location accuracy, applications may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is disabled. To disable this feature, go to Settings > Wi-Fi > Advanced settings, and disable Always allow scanning.
To improve location accuracy, apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is disabled. To disable this feature, go to advanced settings and disable always allow scanning.
To see available networks, enable Wi-Fi.
Select Mobile HotSpot to view its settings.
Disabling Mobile HotSpot…
Easy group network cannot be enabled while Wi-Fi is enabled. Easy group network will be disabled.
Easy group network cannot be enabled while Wi-Fi is enabled. Wi-Fi will be disabled.
Wi-Fi enabled according to Wi-Fi timer
Wi-Fi disabled according to Wi-Fi timer
Automatically disable Mobile HotSpot if there are no connected devices.
Disabling Mobile HotSpot will prevent connected devices from using your mobile network connection.

1. Enable on Wi-Fi on the device that will share your mobile network connection.
2. Select %2$s from the list of available Wi-Fi networks.
3. Connect to %2$s.

1. Enable Wi-Fi on the device that will share your mobile network connection.
2. Select %2$s from the list of available Wi-Fi networks.
3. Connect to %2$s by entering %3$s as the password.
Note: This will enable mobile data and consume more battery.
Mobile HotSpot consumes more battery power. Connect the device to a charger for extended use.
All devices currently connected will be disconnected from the Mobile HotSpot.
Mobile HotSpot will be enabled. This will increase battery consumption and data usage.
Mobile HotSpot is currently being controlled by another application. To configure it, the current Mobile HotSpot connection will end.
Mobile HotSpot not supported.
Unable to enable Wi-Fi while using USB tethering.
This function is disabled. No SIM card has been inserted.
This feature is disabled because Airplane mode is enabled.
This feature has been disabled because mobile data is disabled.

Smart network switch has been enabled. This function helps maintain a stable Internet connection by switching between mobile and Wi-Fi networks, and also between 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands. This may increase your data usage.
Easy group network disabled. Wi-Fi turned on.
Wi-Fi not turned on. Easy group network still enabled.
Do not enable Wi-Fi
Enable Wi-Fi to scan for access points.
Enable Wi-Fi to set up peer-to-peer connectivity.

Wi-Fi Direct enables Wi-Fi devices to connect directly, making printing, file sharing, synchronizing, and screen sharing much simpler and more convenient. Connecting to devices that support Wi-Fi Direct makes it possible to share your content, synchronize your data, socialize with friends, play games, audio, videos, and more, using various applications.
Configure Mobile HotSpot
Enable TalkBack
Enable TalkBack
Disable Wi-Fi when not in use or when not available.
Mobile HotSpots

"Unless you connect to a Wi-Fi network, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email or other apps that require a data connection.
Mobile data will be disabled."
Disable background data on mobile data network only. Wi-Fi will be used if available.
Mobile HotSpots
Enable Wi-Fi to select mobile hotspots.
Enable Airplane mode.

Airplane mode allows you to disable calling, messaging and data network features. It also disable connectivity features such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, enable them in Settings or on the notification panel.
Airplane mode allows you to disable network features, including Wi-Fi. To use Wi-Fi, enable it in Settings or the notification panel.
Auto unlock zone is only available when Wi-Fi is enabled.
Air command and the options below cannot be enabled at the same time. The options below will be disabled.
Share your media files via Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi Direct, or using Mobile HotSpot.
Smart scroll uses the front camera to detect your face. You can scroll through webpages and email messages by tilting your head or device while looking at the screen.
Enable Wi-Fi
Enable Wi-Fi and Mobile data
Disable alarm and timer
"Mobile HotSpot"
Disable Wi-Fi only
Enable dual SIM always on
Hide content you want to keep private. Disable this mode after use to protect your hidden content. Private mode will also be disabled automatically when the device powers off.

Enable this function to automatically disable Private mode when the screen turns off. Make sure to leave the screen on at all times while moving files to Private. Otherwise, some of your data may be lost.

To hide content, select the items you want to hide. Tap the More options button, then select Move to Private. Private mode will be enabled while the selected content is transferred. While Private mode is disabled, the content you moved to Private will be hidden.
Enable Private mode and select the items you want to remove from Private. Then, tap the More options button and select Remove from Private. The selected items will no longer be hidden.
Blocking Mobile data for this guest will disable Mobile data on your device. To use network services, connect to a Wi-Fi network.
When you tap ON, a confirmation message to enable both Wi-Fi and mobile networks will appear.
